thread.title: 5 ways feds less confident on digital than global peers
thread.title_full: 5 ways feds less confident on digital than global peers

title: 5 ways feds less confident on digital than global peers
text:
07 5 ways feds less confident on digital than global peers 
Federal Times: The U.S. is on the forefront of the technological and digital revolution that is changing the way humans interact with each other, as well as their governments. However, according to a new survey from Deloitte, U.S. federal employees aren't seeing the same returns as their foreign counterparts.U.S. feds were notably less confident about their government's ability to incorporate and respond to digital trends than government employees in other countries. Here are five areas where the contrast was most apparent.
